Mastodon

Sometime last year I had half of a great idea for better Asciidoctor handling in Hugo. I might have the other half now:

I keep my content in the content folder

use adoc.txt for the extension so Hugo ignores it

point my build-adoc script there instead of a neigboring adoc folder

profit?

This would work for reStructuredText too. Need to get through a few post cycles to see how it works.
